Flag: Blue field with the Union Flag, a large white seven-pointed star, and constellation of five white stars
Official_Language: None at the federal level, English is the National language

Indigenous_History.Lifestyle: Hunter-gatherers with evidence of land management and agriculture

Cultural_Aspects.Artistic_Traditions: Among the longest surviving traditions in human history

European_Contact.James_Cook: 1770, first recorded European to explore eastern coastline
European_Contact.Other_Explorers: Dutch, French and later English explorers

Indigenous_History.Post_Contact_History: Significant changes due to disease, conflict, and land appropriation

Modern_History.Federation: 1901 as a federation of six colonies
Modern_History.World_Wars: Participated as part of British Empire and later Commonwealth
Modern_History.Post_War_Immigration: More than 6.5 million migrants from every continent

Geographical_Features.Driest_Inhabited_Continent: Australia is the driest inhabited continent
Geographical_Features.Megadiverse_Country: Wide variety of landscapes and climates

International_Standing.Economy: Highly developed market economy, one of the highest per capita incomes globally
